name: 覃鑫富
objective:
Introduction (Chapt. 1)
Material Classification (Chapts. 2 & 3) 
Mechanical Testing (Chapt. 4)
Stress-Strain Equations and Models (Chapt. 5)
Principal States of Stress and Strain (Chapt. 6)
Failure Criteria (Chapt. 7)
Fracture of Cracked Members (Chapt. 8) 
High-Cycle Fatigue (Chapt. 9)
Fatigue of Notched Members (Chapt. 10)
Fatigue Crack Growth (Chapt. 11)
Plastic Deformation (Chapt. 12)
Low-Cycle Fatigue (Chapt. 14)
Creep (Chapt. 15)
schedule: The teacher expects each chapter to be finished weekly, but the schedule is flexible.
scorePolicy:
Homework (~4):  20%
Class Attendance (14-16 weeks): 20%
Journal paper critique (1): 20%
Midterm Exam.:  20%
Final Exam.:  20%
materials: Textbook:  “Mechanical Behavior of Materials” 5th Ed. by N. E. Dowling, Pearson, 2020. (高立圖書公司代理)
consultation: Students might have access to curricular consultation from the advisor to get advice about courses or academic planning.
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）
